company_info.Company Description: Talent Hunters Manpower Solutions, a recruitment consultancy, providing jobs to candidates in corporate sector as well as in BPOs.

jd_information.description: Ø Deal with clients and customers on a daily basis.Ø Discuss clients’ requirements and provide advice on worldwide destinations, tours, accommodation and flights by understanding the clients interest and purpose of visit like family holiday or honeymoon etc.Ø Plan , prepare and cost itineraries for clients as per their requirementsØ Responded to customer travel requests received via all means of business contact (in person, phone, e-mail) for reservation (air ticket, hotel, Travel Insurance & also Visa processing) in an efficient, courteous and timely manner.Ø Performed all functions relating to the booking, administrative and accounting tasks necessary to process electronic and other travel documents as it related to customer requests and industry requirements.Ø Responsible for giving the final Handover to the client with Tour vouchers, tickets, Insurance and other documents.   tour & travel industry background Regards,madhuri
